Or maybe you haven\'t, in which case I\'m afraid this book isn\'t going to be terribly useful.\\n\\n"},{"text":"Water ","color":"blue"},{"text":"is a subtle element, and as temperamental as the sea.\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"Enchantments can allow you to be guided by the water, but to guide the waves yourself, you will need to brave its challenges.\\n\\n- E\\n "}'],title:"Evolving Waters",author:"E..?",generation:1}

You decide Fire\'s fate, now.\\n\\n- E\\n "}'],title:"Leaping Flames",author:"E..?",generation:1}

Though you are surrounded by water, it is the wind that guides your ship where it may.\\nThough my time at the monastery has ended, I will always be grateful for my time amongst those devoted to "},{"text":"Air.","color":"#CDC149"}]','{"text":"Air is the most versatile of the elements, but it does not respond well to fixed plans or closed minds. Sometimes, you must let the wind guide your sails.\\nGood luck to you, stranger.\\n\\n- E"}'],title:"A Learning Breeze",author:"E..?",generation:1}

{pages:['["",{"text":"Trident\\n             "},{"text":"|","color":"aqua"},{"text":"\\n          ","color":"reset"},{"text":"|","color":"aqua"},{"text":"  o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"  |","color":"aqua"},{"text":"\\n      ","color":"reset"},{"text":" >","color":"gold"},{"text":"  *     *","color":"gray"},{"text":"  <","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"  x\\n             ","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":" - Diamond\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"|","color":"aqua"},{"text":" - Diamond Sword (Undamaged)\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"*","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Transmutation Powder\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gold"},{"text":",","color":"reset"},{"text":"< ","color":"gold"},{"text":"- Copper Ingot","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"Some say it was Syrula who flooded the nameless kingdoms that now reside beneath the waves. Some say it was a calamitous spell of their own design. Some say...\\n\\nIt was another.\\n "}','{"text":"The secret of crafting their Tridents was drowned along with them.\\n\\nFortunately for me, I happen to get lucky sometimes. I hope this secret brings you more luck than it brought to them.\\n- E"}'],title:"Formula: Trident",author:"???",generation:1}
